channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel -- SaaS Control Console (SCC) Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel -- SaaS Control Console (SCC) Platform

item.title: CVE-2013-7462|2024-08-06T18:09:16.966Z -- intel -- saas%20control%20console%20%28scc%29%20platform
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability in the web application in McAfee (now Intel Security) SaaS Control Console (SCC) Platform 6.14 before patch 1070, and 6.15 before patch 1076 allows unauthenticated users to view contents of arbitrary system files that did not have file system level read access restrictions via a null-byte injection exploit.
